title: Rescue teams scan mountains for missing after Italian glacier collapse
content:
1. Rescue teams scan mountains for missing after Italian glacier collapse  Reuters
  2. Ice avalanche kills six in Italian Alps amid heatwave  CNN
  3. At least six hikers dead after glacier breaks loose in Italy's Alps  WFAA
  4. Four Hikers Die in Italy After Being Hit by Alpine Glacier Chunk  The Daily Beast
  5. At least 6 hikers dead after large chuck of glacier broke loose at popular Italy trail  12NewsNow
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
